title: Bhagar
overview: In 2018, Bengal was shaken by the infamous "Bhagar" scandal. Paresh who lives in Nonadanga suffers from a great lack of masculinity. He doesn't even hesitate to share his only wife with the neighbourhood ruffian Kana Bapi. Eventually, he chooses to end his life in remorse. Paresh witnesses the man's death right in front of his eyes. He also realises how painful death can be! And decides to live... not terminate his life. Anirban and Inspector Laha are on a mission to expose Iqbal and his fake baby food business.
